title: The Silly Squirrels and the Giant Moon Acorn
author: Claude
description: Nutty looks up at the night sky and sees the BIGGEST ACORN EVER! (It's the moon.) Naturally, the only solution is to build TNT-powered rockets from trashcans and traffic cones to go eat it. Maximum height achieved: 10 feet. Maximum chaos achieved: UNLIMITED.

chapters.title: That's No Moon... Wait, Yes It Is, But Also AN ACORN!
Houston, We Have a Problem (Also Several Explosions)
The Moon Can Wait (But Breakfast Can't)
